text: -[ Grunts ]
-Take your base!

-[ Sighs ] I gotta go
talk to my pitcher.

Looks like your shortstop's
got that handled.
-You gotta be kidding me.

-Listen,
playoffs are on the line.
I'm my usual three-for-three.

You want to tell me
what's going on with you?

-Nothing is going on.
-Really?

Because you're the closest thing
to Batman, besides me,
that I've ever seen,

and he's the second batter
you've hit this inning.

-First of all, you're
the closest thing to Batman
that I've ever seen, besides me.

-Batman doesn't say things
like that.
-And second,

Klepper was crowding the plate,
and Reynolds had it coming.

-If the plan is to throw
at everyone who's had it coming,

then I'm gonna sit back and you
can knock them down one by one.

But that's not
what's going on right now.

-Hey, we gonna play
some time this week?
-Both: Shut up, Reynolds!

-Next time, do us all a favor
and hit him in the mouth.

-I'm a little frustrated.
-What's going on?

-Pellegrini came
to Eddie's diner.

Eddie told Samantha.
They're both scared.
And I'm on tilt

because this scumbag
has gotten under their skin.

-I get it, but Pellegrini's
not here right now,

and we have a game to win,
so get him out of your head.

After this is over,
I'll buy you a couple drinks.
We'll talk this thing through.

-Thanks, Harvey.
-Go get him, Batman.
-Batman.
